www.time.com/time/2002/inventions/toy_doll.html recreation/toys photo by dennis galante for time complete list 2001 best inventions e mail a friend she may look like a casting reject from village of the damned but cindy smart is no creepy alien girl well she is a little creepy with two 16 bit microprocessors voice recognition software and a digital camera lodged in her chest she takes interactive playtime to a new level the doll can do simple math recognize basic shapes and colors respond to 70 preprogrammed questions and read flash cards as long as they re within her vocabulary of 650 english words and a smattering of german spanish italian and french ones if all this gets to be too much you can always switch cindy off and braid her white blond hair availability now $99 to learn more next mini sub try 4 free issues of time from the nov 18 2002 issue of time magazine posted sunday nov 10 2002 copyright 2002 time inc all rights reserved reproduction in whole or in part without permission is prohibited subscribe customer service faq site map search contact us privacy policy terms of use reprints permissions press releases media kit advertisement

www.clovisindependent.com/news/story/5319108p-6309781c.html recreation/toys home valley news shop job quest cars sports yellow pages about us marketplace inside news sports business way of life opinion centennial photo galleries clovis awards rodeo obituaries speak out about us contact us resources schools newspaper ads travel classifieds yellow pages cars apartments homes information national parks galleries newspapers in education communities the fresno bee vida en el valle smart sounds students of help provide voices for innovative doll by heather staff writer published 11 22 02 06 30 16 third and fourth graders at our lady of perpetual help school will be helping children all over the world learn to read spell and even do division without ever leaving their clovis classrooms dean the clovis independent students maria 9 left and joey krueger 9 play with the cindy smart doll that the children s voices helped create all it took was a recording of their voices just before the summer called them away from school and long before the holiday rush begins two classes of students helped create one of the most innovative dolls according to a recent edition of time magazine that will hit the market this year her name is cindy smart and living up to it she can read do math spell speak five languages recognize colors shapes and some 75 phrases that a child might say to her put plainly she can speak see and hear and she owes the latter to the children of when the los angeles based company manley toy quest was creating cindy s software it knew it needed children s voices lots of children s voices to make sure the doll would respond to any child who owned her looking around the city the company couldn t find a single school that would allow toy quest to record the voices of its students so marketing assistant tara remembered her hometown clovis and her home school our lady of perpetual help sister maria sanchez principal of the school wasn t just willing she was excited to help and toy quest and so she said were their parents i sent home letters telling the parents about what tara and the company wanted to do and didn t know what the parents would say they responded so well no one seemed to have a problem sanchez said two classes of children then in the second and third grades spent an entire day reciting over 70 phrases into a special microphone this symphony of voices laid the foundation for cindy s ability to recognize different things a child might say from i love you to what is that word cindy we think that this doll is great and a great educational tool i think that everyone at the school saw that we value education as much as they do said whose mother still teaches at the school when toy quest finished cindy everyone including was surprised at the results even my mouth dropped when i first saw her seeing reading and doing math said a small camera disguised as a button on the precocious looking little blonde allows cindy to see cards placed on her own chalkboard said that cindy is the first doll to truly see what is around her on oct 25 the children who helped create cindy were the first to see the first seeing doll eyes and mouths widened in open amazement as cindy performed her academic magic before the entire student body leaning forward in their seats and whispering stunned responses to their neighbors the children couldn t believe what they were seeing i think it is really neat that an inanimate object other than a calculator can do math problems said maria 9 who would like to teach her cindy doll to recite all the female roles from shakespeare s plays especially juliet she says faking a swoon and giggling even the seventh graders lingering in the back rows couldn t help but smile when cindy read pomme on the board and told them this was french for apple and just when they thought they had seen it all cindy pulled one more trick from her computer mind and solved a complicated division problem students thought it unbelievable turning in his chair to the row behind him as his eyes grew to shocked circles behind his brown framed glasses a slight sandy haired boy pulled his hand from his mouth long enough to gasp out oh my gosh she knows remainders even sister sanchez could hardly believe it oh i just love her i think i ll have to get one to have just for me sanchez said and she won t be the only one hoping to get a cindy of her own many of the children said that she will grace their christmas list but those hoping to own their own smart doll will not find her on the local toy store s shelf this year she will only be available on the home shopping network upon hearing this tommi 9 wondered if santa claus would still be able to bring her a cindy smart maria consoled her nothing can stop santa no lock barricade block nor it would seem cable channel will sidetrack him that sorted children agreed she would make a great gift even for boys i thought she was just going to be a regular old doll i didn t know she d be able to do all that said kyle 10 who now thinks he would like a cindy of his own yeah she could help me do my homework and teach me french of course said cindy can only read and respond to the words and programs in her computer which most likely would not coincide with every homework problem out there sorry kids i think cindy would make a great tool for learning but is definitely no for a teacher in the classroom this is a supplemental tool said homework may be out but learning isn t and neither is one of the most important things to children fun i think the best thing about it is that it s a toy it s fun but it also helps you learn maria said i feel really special that we did this because cindy is going to help a lot of other kids learn to read and do times tables and all kinds of things said lauren 9 not only did the students of help make a toy they also got their very own special cindy donning her own plaid blue school uniform this cindy has one extra word only she can say o l p h i got it that s our lady of perpetual help school said cindy s voice e mail heather at speak out on we invite your comments about this article registration is required for www.wired.com/wired/archive/10.08/cindy.html recreation/toys search wired news wire service news photos animation wired magazine hotbot the web issue 10.08 aug 2002 print email or fax this article for free stepford child she speaks when spoken to she s a teacher s pet .. heck she s got a photographic memory chips and cams and computer programs that s what cindy smart is made of by sonia even though she s just 5 years old cindy smart speaks five languages she s a good reader she can tell time and do simple math including multiplication and division she s not a prodigy she s just good programming cindy looks like an average doll 18 frac12 inches of blond hair baby blue eyes and a button nose but loaded with a digital camera microprocessor and voice recognition software cindy is the first doll that can see think and do as she s told that makes her both surprisingly precocious .. and a little creepy when introduced by toy quest at conventions around the nation earlier this year the doll spooked viewers as she read and counted out loud it was just startling says karl a toy industry veteran if the stepford wives had babies this is what they would be like a buyer for the home shopping network signed up to sell 500 dolls on hsn this july in advance of her debut on store shelves this fall with a $100 price tag photo by james chiang sell mattel the eagle eyed cindy follows in the path of other breakthrough toys like chatty cathy whose pull string statements shook up the doll market 40 years ago or sony s barking aibo robot which was the first to popularize voice command in the late 90s cindy takes aibo s innovations one step beyond she not only follows instructions but shapes colors and words mdash and remembers the effect is a doll that appears to be learning toy quest which also produces tonka trucks and tekno the robotic puppy spent a decade trying to see how much human nature it could breathe into an inanimate object engineers began researching basic and affordable artificial intelligence creating that sense light sounds and pressure they could send digital infrared signals to one another and even judge distances explains bob del principe vp of r d without the sense of sight it seemed like we were lacking one of the most keen abilities that life forms use to react to their environment so how do they make a doll actually see in cindy s case it s a process ask can you read this and her voice recognition software identifies it as one of 70 preprogrammed commands then the lo res digicam scans a 15 degree radius in search of number or letter shaped objects she even recognizes handwriting buried in her belly cindy s 16 bit microprocessor mdash an upgrade from the toy industry standard 4 bit mdash compares the text with her database of 700 words it s a match i love you she says now if she can just learn to use an easy bake oven .. sonia is an assistant editor at wired previous story the bandwidth capital of the world next story gm s billion dollar bet wired blogs read wired magazine columnist bruce sterling s blog beyond the beyond gadget lab newsletter sign up for the newsletter that gives you the 411 on the latest tech toys gadget lab archive shipping info order tracking norwegian links 24 7 toll free order line 1 866 844 5159 norway sweden gift ideas offering norwegian and scandinavian gift ideas imported from norway new trolls for 2005 have just arrived in how to welcome your new troll into your home trolls are believed to bring good luck to those who shall possess them they are made in norway and a little bit of magic troll dust is put in each one when they are hand made in the mountains of the old country there is a small trick to get them to work their good luck most importantly to bring the good luck they need to work their charms in private after you open your package the first thing you need to do is name your troll once you have named your troll put him in a private place where no one can look at or disturb him the time needed is for the sun to rise and set twice it doesn t have to be a place that is quiet or dark but just private they will then work their charms and bring good luck to the household or business that they reside in remember trolls are known to reward the good and punish the bad orders accepted worldwide get your free troll the 2005 club troll has finally arrived just in from norway the 2005 club troll is now available carl larsson figurines from candy design we bring you more of carl larsson figurines to choose from click here to view the latest additions 2005 rolf troll calendar featuring full page illustrations by rolf at only $19.95 2004 are also still available at half price the history of the trolls by bj oslash rn schulze and trygve creators of the trolls far to the north where the winter storms whip the weather beaten coasts you will find a long and narrow country here you see dark forests with moonlit lakes deep fjords surrounded by mighty snowcapped mountains and long rivers and cold streams cascading down the nowadays this country is covered by snow and ice only six months a year a long long time ago however there existed a massive glacier that brooded over the entire country for thousands of years as the climate gradually warmed and the glacier slowly retreated to the north man to the south of the glacier followed in its wake looking at this country and finding it to be magnificent they considered themselves to be its first inhabitants people settled there and named it norway click here to continue with the story.. view cart check out all items are stocked unless otherwise noted candy design trolls henning trolls trolls pocket trolls trolls rolf troll gifts whimsical trolls copyright 2002 2004 trolls online all rights reserved

www.createanangel.com/ recreation/toys create an angel is a company with simple objectives and guiding principles we want to bring joy delight and happiness to those who encounter our angels and staff there are 2 divisions of create an angel first meet our adorable baby angels these angel dolls or angel babies make great gifts for any special occasion and holiday our beautiful angel dolls were carefully chosen with 7 delightfully different expressions all angel babies are adorned with handmade wings create your angel in two quick steps choose from dolls with the cutest expressions that look and feel like real babies great for any occasion from new birth baby shower birthday christmas new years valentines day mother s day wedding graduation and many others or just because add a tune such as happy birthday rock a bye baby wedding march amazing grace or other to capture your special occasion lastly add your angel s name to the birth certificate you have now created your angel what a statement and unique gift you have created for someone special our customers are placing these adorable babies among their angel collectibles click on angel dolls above or angels on the side bar to view our family of angels equally as uplifting is our annual book of angels this is where you nominate real people whose name will be memorialized in print the nomination is free and all genuine submissions will be included in this annual book of angels what an honored gift to bestow upon those individuals who perform selfless acts of kindness throughout the year

www.littlesouls.com/ recreation/toys click here to seethe latest arrivals we are often asked how we go about designing our dolls we want to believe it 39 s one part what has worked before one part current trends and one part what we like it 39 s good to be the queens we are a workshop of creative types dangerous when you 39 ve got to stay focused and corral a million ideas we have meetings we make sketches we dream we wake at 3 am but in the end it 39 s the dolls themselves who often determine what their personalities will be we shape their faces we add a swatch of curly hair and it becomes obvious this one is an artist that one a lover of cats another a world traveler someone once said if we just left the dolls alone they would gather cuteness we would have to agree they are a capable bunch so as we stand knee deep in buttons ribbons threads sketches and dreams we can be certain that somewhere within our workshop there quietly gathers another painter of sunsets a collector of starfish and a dancer for all seasons the possibilities are endless gretchen and colleen home about us shop online news events dealers contact us copyright 2002 little souls privacy policy
www.jsm-miniatures.com/ recreation/toys jsm miniatures specialists in 1 12 scale rainwater fittings for doll s houses jsm miniatures specialists in 1 12 scale rainwater fittings for doll s houses welcome to specialists in 1 12 scale rainwater fittings for doll s houses n.b rainwater fittings are 1 12 scale but house for demonstration only and not to exact scale is it possible that your house is missing that finishing touch of authenticity if you need gutters and we can help since 1994 jsm miniatures have specialised in offering collectors the most extensive range of 1 12 scale gutters rainwater heads spouts and associated fittings for doll s houses all the components have been designed to faithfully replicate the cast iron foundry pieces of the victorian period the high level of accuracy was achieved with the aid of old catalogues from william macfarlane s saracen foundry in glasgow and from sloan davidson of leeds who until recently continued to supply fittings for listed buildings in addition guttering and still actually in use were photographed and measured the items in our comprehensive range are moulded mainly in black abs plastic and are ready to fit the parts can be glued easily with most model adhesives and where needed fixing pins are supplied any cutting requires only a razor saw and although supplied in black the parts can be painted if so desired with model enamel paints following similar detailed research we are planning to add a range of pre victorian fittings covering the late 1600s up to the introduction of cast iron pieces i.e the late tudor to georgian period please choose from the menu on the left

www.miniaturesandmore.com/ recreation/toys about miniatures and more miniatures and more was unofficially started by my grandfather anthony andy liguori in the basement workshop of his daughter and my aunt gloria agel andy built the wonderful homes he saw around madison new jersey into miniature dollhouses the year was 1978 and andy was 79 years old the miniature dollhouse business grew by word of mouth until gloria was forced to open a dollhouse and miniature shop in 1988 to handle the ever growing demand in 1992 andy passed at the age of 93 still building miniature dollhouses to the end but the dream stayed alive his son and my father tony jr along with my mom janet continued the liguori tradition of building unique handcrafted miniature dollhouses until my dad passed in april of 2003 today my mom and i continue to build the original liguori dollhouses as well as the taylor jade line of wonderful colonial and victorian miniatures we also carry a full line of kits furniture and accessories for both the child and collector from the finest artists around the world my mom janet and i hope you enjoy a little piece of our store tony liguori iii owner miniatures more enter web site design maintenance by web alliance international inc

order checkout mary d s dolls bears was begun in 1980 thanks to our having 2 little girls who loved dolls bears unicorns fairies just about any kind of plush animal we took our girls to disney world every couple of years and fell in love with the world of fantasy i am very particular about ensuring that the dolls bears who come into my home as well as into yours are of the finest quality and free of defects we do our best to make sure that you receive knowledgeable friendly service and the best collectibles we accept master visa discover cards w expiration date or personal checks with address driver s license phone number w area code the major collector lines such as madame alexander steiff want to ensure that their products maintain the collectible title which equates to maintaining their value therefore we concur with their policy of non discounting on new products the major companies have endorsed mary d s policy of providing a discount to our best customers by allowing a private club through our store wherein an annual club fee is charged this is called the preferred customer club pcc for which there three levels of membership ranging from $19.95 to $49.95 for continental usa $29.95 to $59.95 for non continental usa the club allows customers to choose a level that matches their spending level to obtain maximum value the memberships runs from january through december this pcc entitles members to discounts ranging from 10 to 20 off regular prices along with special coupon and discounts for quantity and multi purchases of products from each company please click on the pcc membership link to see details of the entire program email please e mail us 24 hours day with comments or questions please note we are closed sun you may not receive a reply until our next business day mary d s has been in business for 24 years we are truly the store for collectors mary d s dolls bears such 8060 university avenue ne fridley mn 55432 telephone 763 795 8900 fax 763 795 8904 store hours cst monday 12 00 6 00 tuesday 12 00 8 00 wednesday 12 00 6 00 thursday 12 00 8 00 friday 12 00 6 00 saturday 10 00 4 00 sunday closed note the email printout you will receive after order placement is for approval of the order but does not guarantee item availability if any items are unavailable you will be notified by email within 3 business days shipping charges are for continental usa shipping outside continental usa will incur additional charges you will be notified via email of the exact charges thank you

modified august 04 2003 this site designed by joe darin we accept cash personal checks money orders or credit cards i dedicate this site to sri sathya sai baba welcome the aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things but their inward significance aristotle b.c 384 322 caution because of the large number of photographs on many pages on this web site they may be slow to open and i hope you find them worth the wait to see an enlarged view of each thumbnail roll your cursor over it to see more photographs of these pieces click on their thumbnail welcome to my studio this site is best viewed using ms internet explorer 5.0 or better i hope you enjoy your visit to my studio and find something to admire that you will wish to acquire throughout these galleries you will find both my bronze sculptures and my cloth sculptures so the galleries are divided by works for purchase works in process and an archive of works sold to find out more about these pieces above click on their respective thumbnails or click on one of the buttons at the upper left to take your own tour of my studio the first four photographs shown above are some of my most recent finished work i sculpted morning news from a live model who lives in san diego i was fascinated by the way he held the newspaper and his expression which made him look almost as if he were dozing after a fulfilling sunday breakfast reflections balboa park is my version of the reflecting pool at balboa park you see she is really a lotus with frogs all over because she s jointed you can change her positions in relation to the floating lily pads which also move fire dog came from some dalmatian fabric coordinates i had saved since 9 11 everyone has talked so much about firemen i thought it was time to honor the dogs as well then we had wild fires in san diego so he wears the sd fireman s shield on his hat silk is another bronze piece which one collector chose to be a companion to their bust jasmine and decided to be a sponsor for the work you can read all about sponsorship on silk s page and on the collector s page to acquire any of my works for yourself or your private collection or to commission me to make a special piece for you email call 858 514 8154 or fax me at 858 514 8144 we accept checks and all major credit cards be sure to inquire about our investment plans

store.dollhousesbygrace.com/ recreation/toys dollhouses by grace home dollhouses are the perfect gift for any occasion you are guaranteed to have a fun rewarding and educational experience building that special dollhouse with your loved ones whether you are shopping for a dollhouse as a gift or for your own hobby interest can help you get started with everything you need to know before buying a dollhouse online here you will find information about the kits construction supplies finishing materials miniature furniture and classic build simplicity kits the big houses and other fun display case adhesives to assemble your doll tool kits for paints by painter s wiring kits for dining room kitchen living next this guide was created to help answer any questions you have when buying and building your dollhouse kit it includes everything you need to know before buying a dollhouse online includes information about the kits construction supplies finishing materials miniature furniture and more comes with complete checklist of supplies equipment you need to build the perfect consider these factors when choosing a dollhouse 61623 size there are many different sizes to choose to fit any budget from $60 for a small cottage to over $800 for an estate such as the queen anne finished dollhouses range in size from 2 92 to 4 92 tall and wide so be sure have a large enough work play area for your new dollhouse kit see all of our kits under the dollhouses kits link 61623 ease of building all dollhouses sold on dollhouses by grace come with an illustrated instruction booklet to guide you through the process of assembling your dollhouse using just basic tools such as a hammer glue and a utility knife you can build your perfect dollhouse refer to the following section your construction supplies 94 for details on the necessary supplies you will need for a great looking and easy to assemble dollhouse consider the simplicity series made by real good toys 61623 finish dollhouse kits can be purchased with a smooth or milled exterior finish kits with a milled exterior finish have the clapboard siding milled directly onto the exterior portions of the house providing the look and feel of real clapboard siding a milled exterior finish is recommended if this is your first dollhouse project for it will greatly reduce the time and effort required to assemble the shell if you are an experienced builder you may prefer a smooth exterior finish with a smooth finish you can build and attach your own exterior materials such as brick stone miniature clapboard siding or a combination thereof 61623 material all dollhouse kits and are constructed of either medium density fiber board mdf or plywood ranging in thickness from bc 94 to 3 8 94 the 3 8 94 plywood or mdf is usually preferred over bc 94 material because it is more sturdy and will ultimately hold up stronger over the years 2 pick your construction supplies here is a list of tools and items you will need to build and finish your dollhouse 61623 hammer 61623 utility knife 61623 wood glue 61623 masking tape 61623 sand paper 61623 paint brushes 61623 paints and primer for the exterior 61623 shingle dye for the roof shingles included in your kit click here 61623 wood filler items marked with an asterisk 93 94 are included in the supplies value pack part 3 finish the interior dollhouses by grace supplies all the items you need to finish the interior of your house including the following 61623 paints don 92t forget your primer 61623 wallpaper 61623 trim window cornice chair rail etc 61623 hardwood flooring 61623 tile floors and walls 61623 carpeting wall to wall and throw rugs 61623 window treatments 61623 of these items are not yet listed on dollhouses by grace but will be soon so please check back as we are adding new items every day 4 furnish your house select from thousands of miniature items to complete your perfect dollhouse items are available for every room of your house in any style from any era like the interior finishing products many of these items are not yet listed on dollhouses by grace but will be soon so please check back as we are adding new items every day and when you are ready to take it to the next level of realism consider wiring your house with electricity with working fixtures outlets and switches also consider adding a stucco brick or stone exterior how about realistic landscaping all these items and supplies plus more will be added to our web soon so please keep checking back 211 way harleysville pa call 1 800 641 3424 show my order email us shipping info www.pennywisedolls.com recreation/toys home database dot wise began collecting dolls in 1959 dot is a registered nurse by profession perhaps this is what inspired her to open penny wise doll hospital forty years ago penny wise doll hospital first opened in jacksonville florida later dot moved to norfolk virginia and then to warrenton virginia taking penny wise doll hospital to each new location for the past twenty nine years dot and her doll hospital have been residing in st cloud florida where she is well known having repaired thousands of dolls and well received she has purchased 8 old doll hospitals with their entire stock as well dot was a member of the united federation of miniature enthusiasts and the international old and international federation of doll clubs inc dot has traveled to the uk and europe and now has one of the finest collections of dolls in the united states the time has come to find new homes for most of her dolls therefore they are being made available to those who appreciate them and are willing to give them a loving home contact dot for information about any of the dolls offered here she will soon be adding to the on line list of dolls so please visit often to view the updated list the very doll you have been looking for may be the next one added there are very few new or reproduction dolls in this collection penny wise dolls is offering the following ideal dolls alexander dolls mattel effanbee pin cushions etc as well as some museum items over 2000 other dolls not listed in these pages plus dolls from foreign countries dolls you remember from your childhood and dolls like your mother and grandmother had some heads only who s bodies have long since gone there are blown antique glass eyes 1920 baby type shoes and etc email dot and ask for whatever you are looking for we will try to ship your orders as soon as possible after receiving your payment using priority us mail prices do not include shipping usually not over $10.00 unless out of the country hits dot wise po box st cloud fl 1305 terms of use privacy statement content copyright a9 2003 penny wise dolls all rights reserved copyright a9 2003 all rights reserved please send your questions comments or bug reports to the webmaster

www.maui.net/~reman/dollshp.html recreation/toys hawaiian doll shop mango rose doll shop order a display case for your doll kathy has been featured in many local publications and is well known for her work with the natural materials of maui her hawaiian collectable s grace the homes of collectors world wide the dolls are fashioned from the palm the banana the norfork pine protea ti and other natural plants that make up the beauty of maui on any day she can be found searching the island for new materials for use in her creations she also makes hawaiian photo albums that are very popular among vistors perfect for your hawaiian photos each doll offered for sale is available at the time it is posted we update the available dolls as often as possible sometimes a doll could be sold or we could receive 2 orders for the same doll in the case duplicate orders they are filled on a first come first serve basis if the doll you order is sold you will be notified and given the opportunity to make a new selection we will never substitute unless requested a doll you will always get the doll you prices include shipping tax if you will be visiting maui and would like to purchase a doll while on maui call kathy at 800 645 3753 or 808 879 8744 she will be happy show you her complete collection each doll is an original one of a kind signed by the well known hawaiian artist kathy have a dearly loved and talented artist friend mike johnson we created this site and expanded to the internet wow we are having fun meeting other adult kids from all over the world our goal here at let s play dolls is to help create a happy childhood for each and every customer regardless of age we believe it is never too late so please come play dolls with us to view any of over 200 pictures just click on the doll number all items are guaranteed to be as represented and may be returned within five 5 days of receipt if you are not satisfied please click here to see our complete return policy you to contact your local customs office for import information before finalizing your order we cannot be responsible for taxes duty or any fees assessed by your government all forms of payment are accepted including mastercard visa american express and discover personal checks must clear before dolls will be shipped our order page transfers all information over a secure link so you may be assured your privacy is protected short layaways can be negotiated on an individual basis we are always interested in buying dolls both for resale and to play with ourselves we collect 1960 s english sure to bookmark this site and keep checking back for updates if you need a particular size pattern and do not see it listed let me know and i will try to locate it for you i also have a large supply of commercial patterns for sale or trade and can supply missing pieces for many patterns i am adding new patterns and selling patterns all the time so if there is something you are looking for just ask i may have it and just haven t listed it yet if you have an incomplete pattern check my list of patterns if you see it listed i can supply the missing pieces for $1 each if you do not see your pattern listed just email me at and i will let you know if i can supply the missing pieces if you have a pattern that is not listed on my site and you want to trade or sell it let me know i am always looking for more patterns if there is an in the price column i do not have a copy of that pattern for sale at the present time but can supply missing pieces of that pattern for you when i do get the pattern in i will have a price listed in that column thanks for visiting and be sure to come back often as i am adding new patterns every for visiting and please email me with any no part of this www.sew-dolling.com/ recreation/toys 18 dolls clothes 18 22 baby doll items what s new sew able dolls 99 physical therapy accessories so cute american girl bitty furniture boutique new school clothes school days dolly sew casual dressed to the 9 s holiday apparel sports outdoor fun dolly s lingerie footwear colonial times boys department clearance sale baby doll clothes baby nursery lee middleton dolls how to order about us shipping information contact us sew able dolls equipment doll clothes furniture accessories for 18 american girl ae doll baby doll clothes baby nursery lee middleton dolls check them out on the sew able dolls 99 webpage new shoes new kitchen new outfits much more sew able and special like me.. new physical therapy equipment now here new realistic wheelchairs parallel bars walkers arm braces trampolines gym mats and swiss physical therapy balls a portion of each sale will be donated to hospitals that help children special sew able 18 dolls have arrived patented in the u.s and internationally 2003 patent 482 415 limited editions available check them out on the sew able 99 webpage sew able and special like me.. above knee and below knee prosthetic legs limited first edition 1st vinyl doll of it s kind u.s and international patent 2003 sew 99 llc what a wonderful gift to give a child to let them know how special they really are isn t it time there was a doll out there like this too many toy manufacturers have decided this type of doll was far too expensive to produce for the profit they would make this is true as this doll is not your typical vinyl doll each of the dolls with prosthetic legs have been specially fitted with both an above knee and below knee prosthesis and have been carefully designed to look as real and natural as possible without jeopardizing the safety or play factor this is how i put my leg on the dolls with prostheses all have an above the knee and below the knee amputation the dolls without hair will include a wig and a hat to wear if they choose all of the dolls will include crutches in their box as well as other accessories the faces were delicately hand painted and given cute little dimples in their cheeks because the cost to produce these dolls was high they are limited in number this will make them highly collectible some have only 172 in their edition we believe the expense put into the doll is well worth it if it can help one child feel accepted this is also a great way to help other children who have friends classmates or siblings with disabilities to understand that we are all different special and unique doctors have the major role in improving the physical well being of the child family and psychological support and play therapy are also extremely important to help the child build their sense of self worth they may long to see other children who look like they do but this is not always possible these dolls are offered as a supplement to help them in their journey the name sew able was chosen because the term disabled often separates children from their friends at a time when they need to feel accepted and able they are all too aware of the things they feel they cannot do it s very important for them to believe in the things that they can do we hope you enjoy them we have had a fun and often worrisome few years designing these to be ready one day that day has finally arrived we believe god has had a hand in this all along i would like to thank all the people who have helped us in the process the design of the prosthetics was molded by a children s orthotics and prosthetics specialist on the other side of the country who did not even know who i was when he offered to help thank you jon cpo the beautiful box design was graciously given by a wonderful christian man and business owner thank you mark the inside of the box design was made by my mother and me on the floor of our sewing room thanks mom the patience and hard work in a country half a world away was organized by a very special and talented doll maker thank you penny and lastly i cannot forget my father who has listened to all my ideas and really understood why this doll was important without the help of all of these people none of this would have ever been possible thank you most of all to god check them out on the sew able dolls 99 webpage note these dolls are very specialized and difficult to produce and therefore more complex than other 18 dolls on the market they can stand with crutches and most of the time they can even stand without crutches by helping them learn to balance you can teach them how to stand on their own don t forget to teach them how to put their legs on tight there are instructions on the sew able dolls 99 webpage and also in the cool box they will come in they will not be available in the retail stores we also have some boy dolls for questions please email us sew we also have the lee middleton dolls baby doll clothes furniture accessories items that fit american girl ae or lee middleton ae dolls featuring doll clothes doll accessories doll furniture and much more for american girl ae doll lee middleton ae doll and baby ae dolls or other 18 21 inch dolls their size we are not affiliated with the american girl ae pleasant company updated on 03 20 2005 this site donates a portion of sales for abused children and animals click here to see two of the littlest ones that were rescued our world of dolls welcome you are visitor number click here to find out how you can receive a surprise gift with your order email me at sew sew p.o box 53 east greenwich rhode island email fax 401 398 0070 new items added on 03 20 05 home what s new american girl pc clearance sale accessories sew cute furniture boutique new school clothes school days dolly site it is always changing

toys v craft creations welcome to our store safari doll tents sleeping bags v craft s adorable 14 inch safari tents are perfect for children s doll and action figure playtime wonderfully styled for stuffed beanie style animals and unlimited imaginative play filled with your child s own dolls or plush toys the v craft safari tents have large plastic windows for playtime visibility and unique toy display in a child s room built for rugged play for the top of a dresser afterward all safari tents have sturdy loops on top for easy carry or hanging lightweight doll toys in the corner of a room v craft s unique tent dome construction features safe entirely open inner area to maximize play dangerous vertical posts like other tents time to break camp collapsible v craft tents can be quickly taken down for storage gift shipping or cleaning v craft sleeping bags are perfect accessories for a child s safari tent playtime the bags easily fit 12 inch dolls and beanies v craft sleeping bags have a tab flap and decorative functional ribbons that can either be bow tied or used to tie a true playtime camping bed roll v craft safari tents sleeping bags will entertain your childs creative mind for many hours of imaginative fun hardwood doll furniture unique transformation this durable finely hand crafted toy furniture is designed to function as two for a bit of doll relaxation or.. safari bunk beds simply place one sofa on top of the other to create safari bunk beds the posts of the upper sofa fit precisely onto the ball finials of the lower sofa for securely stacked safari bunk bed play handmade construction is of solid clear unfinished maple harmful chemical finishes engineered frame joints are precisely mitered and bonded for durability v craft s colorful handmade mattress pads and pillows add delightful vibrant color and plush detail to this versatile toy the soft padded mattress cushions are included with furniture items as shown and feature high sheen decorative ribbons that bow tie to posts pillows also included as shown are for both safari sofa back arm and safari bunk bed pillow use fabric options durable craftsmanship and dual use functionality make the v www.dollsandcrafts.com recreation/toys adrienne mcdonald presents upcoming events related articles caroline greene for those who can t live without 149 if you are a talented doll artist looking for a unique way to market your 149 if you are a passionate doll collector who is always on the hunt for the next special doll to add to your collection.. 149 if you are someone who would enjoy hosting a doll sale in your home and reaping the benefits of doll 149 if you would like to hold a dolls at home fundraiser for your favorite charity or then dolls at home will be of great interest to you contact andrea levitt ph 718 852 6215 fax 718 802 1880 as a passionate doll collector i live with dolls the way some people live with other forms of art dolls at home is a new business i started to promote this art form and bring together artists and collectors who appreciate the unique work of contemporary doll artists in the u.s this tier of artists has a difficult time finding desirable outlets for the sale of their work collectors such as myself find it impossible to find this type of doll art gathered together in a meaningful way in one location on a consistent basis what better place to exhibit and sell these dolls than in the homes of doll enthusiasts the dolls at home team will bring the dolls to the home of a hostess and help find the local target audience dolls are also available for purchase by appointment i hope to hear from you barbara juanita robinson caroline greene adrienne mcdonald paula whaley the crafty sisters caroline greene dolls shown on these pages are available for purchase andrea levitt ph 718 852 6215 fax 718 802 1880 e mail upcoming events related articles

desirable items at reasonable prices i have made every attempt to accurately describe the condition of each item especially the french and german antique dolls as each item has been carefully inspected and if made of bisque if you see an antique french bebe or other antique item you are interested in either to purchase or for additonal information please feel free to contact me by e mail or phone 732 255 5288 visit often as my selections will be updated regularly i am always looking for new and interesting collectibles .. if you are interested in selling any of your dolls please feel free to contact me by e mail terms of purchase i accept personal and cashier checks money orders including those issued through bidpay and wire transfers credit card payment is accepted through paypal for your convenience but please add 3.5 to the total amount due shipping and insurance are not included in the purchase price and will be actual costs with no additional handling charge i welcome international buyers who are responsible for all actual foreign shipping costs and customs duties in their country layaway terms layaway terms are available to meet your needs and are available from 90 days to 12 months 15 deposit is required there are no money refunds on layaways only credit for use on other dolls or items on the website monthly payments must be made timely anything beyond 30 days over due is considered cancelled cancelled layaways will result in credit to be applied toward a future purchase returns all items are guaranteed as described i offer a 3 day return privilege but items must be returned in the same condition in which they were sent and must be fully insured upon return full purchase price less shipping will be refunded to you welcome french bisque 1 french www.roche-dolls.co.uk/ recreation/toys lynne and michael roche make fine artist dolls in porcelain wood and cloth for doll collectors each doll is handcrafted using the finest materials including antique fabric and plant dyes for much of the uniquely designed clothing the outfits are often in cotton wool or silk cloth with inventive and very original knitting most dolls are fully articulated hand carved in lime wood they allow great movement and play with deep glass eyes and real hair wigs they range between 11 and 20 inches tall our smallest doll is 7 inches with a cloth body and porcelain head and hands roche dolls can be found in collections and museums all over the world and have been called by their collectors antiques of the future welcome to our website where you may find details of our 2005 collection and details of some collections from the past we have pages for our collectors club and some that tell a brief history of ourselves and our dollmaking you will find price and purchase infomation on roche dolls together with our contact details the site contains details of how to order our celebratory book covering 25 years dollmaking the book is a beautiful and informative publication witten by barbara day the hard cover book has around 120 pages in full colour forming a complete volume covering all the dolls we have made this beautiful book provides a fascinating insight into the development of our unique collection

www.realmsofgold.com recreation/toys realms of gold inc fairy tale dolls and puppets welcome to realms of gold inc we create huggable one of a kind cloth dolls and puppets based on traditional folk and fairytale characters from around the globe made of fine yarns and fabrics the dolls and puppets are as happy telling stories in a classroom sleeping in a three year old s arms or sitting on a collector s shelf we are also a cloth doll hospital repairing and rejuvenating favorite dolls from past childhoods so that they can once more become active participants in love and play please step in and visit some of our characters from realms of gold character dolls multi sided or flip dolls apple children and friends stuffed animals puppets ordering information doll hospital and clothier upcoming shows about us new for 2005 dragons featured on the cover of the palo alto weekly december 2003 click here to read the article also see the article on us in stanford s cardinal inquirer click here to read the article for more information on any of our dolls and puppets please feel free to e mail us at realms of gold or call us at 650 691 0767 copyright 2004 and realms of gold inc a place for you to promote your artwork for free handmade by artisans webring previous next random site list sites join stats home this site is a member of webring to browse visit here this site is listed in this site is also listed at the swappers and collectors pages everything for collectors for more craft sites check out about arts directory of crafts related websites and discussion groups for information on other types of dolls check out another good source for doll information and resources more fairy tale information check out the fairy tales directory fairy tales related news books and web resources

www.feralcheryl.com.au/ recreation/toys navigation meet feral cheryl who s feral cheryl ethics of production where you ll find her live simply run wild going feral e zine media coverage what people are saying behind the scenes how to order search this site join going feral last updated march 2003 feral cheryl 2003 site design by who s feral cheryl here she is the anti barbie fresh from the rainforests of northern new south wales australia this 34 cm vinyl doll runs barefoot dreadlocks her hair with coloured braids and beads wears simple rainbow clothes has piercings and a range of tattoos and even a bit of natural body hair feral cheryl is modelled on the green extremists known as 8216 ferals 8217 from australia for more on the background to feral cheryl see 8216 behind the scenes 8217 in contrast to the 8216 fashion doll 8217 mentality feral cheryl does not have an extensive wardrobe or high heels or swimsuit or gym gear or wedding dress or cheerleader outfit she needs no sports car or hairdressing salon no disco stage or shopping mall her motto is live simply run wild her only accessories a bag of home grown herbs a sense of humour and a social conscience each feral cheryl doll is individually crafted with a variety of coloured beads and a range of tattoos so there are no two exactly the same the doll comes with a small stash of dried basil ethics of production feral cheryl is made entirely in australia there is no cheap third world toy factory labour used in the production of this doll the plastic body with sewn in hair is produced in a small family owned doll factory in south australia the feral cheryl doll mould was specifically designed to have a natural body shape the doll is blow moulded which unfortunately means small details such as nipples and clearly defined fingers are not possible the original doll had brown eyes but sometimes because of a problem with sourcing the glass brown eyes there have been dolls made with blue eyes there are usually both blue eyed and brown eyed dolls in stock you can specify which style you want on ordering see order page the raw bodies are then shipped to the where they are transformed into feral cheryl 133 with handpainted tattoos body piercings hair beading braiding and hand dyed handmade clothes they are then packaged in recycled cardboard boxes ready for posting the only other packaging is reused plastic bag around the doll and reused or recycled packing material usually pages out of the old yellow pages there is also a poster with details of feral cheryl 146 s lifestyle for more details on who makes the dolls see behind the scenes for details on the conditions in the factories where most other toys are made see toys of misery where you ll find feral cheryl you may find feral cheryl at a local market her dreadlocks tied back belly button bared dancing away to in her bare feet or protesting against the expansion of uranium mining protesting against logging at a threatened forest working to regenerate rainforest volunteering at the local environment centre working at a vegetarian cafe at school college university studying celtic mysticism lobbying on human rights issues helping her sisters disregard the fashion industry s warped images of skinny dipping at the creek designing a tattoo growing organic and herbs making her own incense and herbal potions painting childrens faces at the kindergarten making clothes out of recycled doing street theatre painting murals writing songs baking bread or unusual cookies doing whatever she wants to always living simply running wild meet feral cheryl live simply run wild going feral e zine media coverage what people are saying behind the scenes how to order privacy

body parts kits kit welcome to my website whether you are a dollhouse enthusiast or love to collect miniature porcelain dolls i hope you ll enjoy my creations 160 in 1 inch 1 2 inch scale as a child i was always fascinated by all miniatures and never thought of making my own until i was an adult since then it has become my greatest passion 160 my dolls have won numerous awards and in the fall of 2002 i was honored to receive the title of artisan 160 my creations are made from commercial molds of well known artists and 160 from my own original dolls several collectors in the us as well in england virgin island canada have purchased my dolls 160 7 of which are displayed in the miniatures museum of care and dedication to details goes into each and every doll the realistic expression of their face is accomplished with my special method of china painting and by firing each doll 6 to 8 times 160 160 they are museum quality from doll kits to dressed dolls 160 if you have a special doll you remember mom saying you get what you pay for another one of those childhood memories that last a life time there are many grades and types of synthetic fiber that are used in the production of doll wigs the doll wigs you purchase here are made of the same fiber that is used for synthetic human hair wigs more than any other wig fiber we believe this to be the best on the market but that is what we believe you need to determine that yourself by trying our product please read our refund policy below before you start to shop please read the following to avoid disappointment in most cases the size of the doll in has no relationship to the size of the wig shoe or accessory you are ordering that is to say an 18 doll can take a size 8 9 10 11 12 13 or larger or smaller depending on the circumference of the head all dolls are not created equal don t be disappointed please measure the circumference of your dolls head as we show you in inches by clicking below you must measure the dolls foot or the shoe you are replacing and if you measured inches you must covert this to millimeters mm sorry there is no other way if you are a baby boomer didn t pay attention in school or haven t a clue don t let this scare you jean of nj writes wow i got the shoes they are so beautiful great quality great price great service i believe in giving praise where praise is do and you deserve it marilynbolden.com recreation/toys beautiful hand made porcelain and vinyl dolls created by original doll artist marilyn bolden i have been an artist as long as i can remember as a child i was always drawing mostly horses and cartoon characters later i studied fashion design and majored in art in college the art career was put on hold for awhile as i married and raised a family during this time i did find some spare moments to explore my creative side in addition to drawing and painting i attempted batik stained glass embroidery quilting and made many stuffed animals and dolls it was about ten years ago that i discovered sculpting and dollmaking and this has become my career at first i made one of a kind portrait dolls and eventually began to make limited editions of my sculptures in porcelain recently i have done several editions in vinyl i love making dolls and am happy to say that they have been well received by collectors all over the world marilyn bolden marilyn with new dolls 124 order info 124 company info 124 special offers for additional information email us at best experienced with click here to start microsoft is a registered trademark and the microsoft internet explorer logo is a trademark of microsoft

next previous random list sites ring of miniature artisans want to join a miniature network ring next previous random list siti lista siti questo sito del ringsurf anello a nadia nadia s doll making doll making is an ancient japanese art the end products are ancient japanese figures to scale in authentic costumes the origin of dolls dates back to the early 18th century takahashi a priest at the kamo shrine in kyoto the capital of japan at that time created a doll body from scraps of willow wood trees and covered it with left over brocades and silk scraps used for the shrine festivals those dolls were called kamo dolls 1 nadia signs and dates all her dolls 2 nadia s dolls are tailored made to your color preferences 3 nadia teaches on line washi paper the prints are all reproductions of old kimono fabrics lately there are some new and modern designs that have come out the majority however are all old prints for more information on washi click here washi eggs are made from real chicken egg shells covered with washi paper each egg is handmade and takes about 4 days to finish other materials that are used in making washi or machine made washi are and others italian doll magazine italian doll magazine the first doll magazine in italy featuring conventions seminars and exhibits by original artist sensei has been my mentor and my teacher for more than 20 years she taught me ikebana school and tea ceremony i owe sensei a lot that is why this web site is dedicated to her .she is not related to any of the doll making schools that i represent .in my heart she will always be my japanese mother copyright 2001

www.klynndesigns.com/ recreation/toys from my heart to yours dolls designed and created by karen lynn brock k lynn designs are one of a kind each doll will arrive with a numbered certificate of authenticity k lynn designs native american collector dolls can now be seen at the minnesota historical society in st paul minnesota and the mille lacs indian trading post in minnesota karen lynn brock karen s story karen owner of k lynn designs has been an artist all her life her handcrafted one of a kind dolls capture a variety of cultures with their own unique characteristics displaying a variety of personalities and a feeling of a different time and place each doll comes to life in karen s hands evolving from her heart imagination and life experiences i do not want them to look alike like the dolls in the stores i want each of them to be one of a kind and with this philosophy karen uniquely hand crafts each doll since a young girl karen has painted clothes and crafted jewelry when she first sat down to create a doll the artist not the crafter went to work k lynn dolls stand 8 1 2 to 13 tall crocheted hair of all colors from blonde to black of all different styles dolls may have ribbons beads or crochet doilies either on hair or holding them dolls may have scarf or be wearing a hat some dolls may be holding a basket of fruit flowers blankets or the art that they made different solids prints satins and linens may be used for dress wear dolls may have earrings or some type of jewelry dolls may have belts or ribbons buttons dollies etc the materials are safe and are never taken from any extinct animals if i do use bones or other it s imitation of similar product contact information telephone 2784 fax 2784 postal address mn electronic mail general information sales webmaster home contents feedback order form page designed by gift shop for nascar nhra cart and f1 collectible diecast please visit gift shop at author is a member of copyright a9 2001 k lynn designs

collection 1997 rare doll limited stock barbie as marilyn monroe captures all the beauty and charm of this famous actress in costumes specially recreated from two of her most famous films from twentieth century fox among the many photographs of marilyn monroe perhaps none captures her beauty and allure as much as the famous scene of her standing above the grill in new york as the subway rushes by from the film the seven year itch barbie as marilyn wears her famous white halter dress with crystal and beautiful faux pearl earrings collectors will love the incredible way barbie recaptures the stunning beauty of marilyn in this famous scene from a great film special offer price pound 44.95 free uk postage express order by phone here or order online from our doll shop barbieclothes.netfirms.com/ recreation/toys web hosting by netfirms free domain names by netfirms home available items wedding dresses ball gowns party dresses casual dresses and skirts shorts and pants suits lingerie ordering barbie doll clothes from fashion doll boutique handmade by debbie we recently moved if you are not automatically redirected then click here i am announcing that i will no longer be taking orders for these clothes i ve enjoyed making these clothes and providing them to you and i ve enjoyed your comments but i no longer have the time to take orders i will make dresses on occasion and will post those on the available link on the menu it seems that many people enjoy looking through these pages so for the time being i will leave this website intact but i can not take requests to make any of these clothes as much as i would like to thank you for your patronage and your comments all of barbie s clothes found in this boutique use velcro fasteners to make it easier for barbie s little friends to dress her we can accept credit cards or electronic check through paypal if you like these clothes you may like some of the discontinued doll patterns we have have a look vintage doll patterns barbie is a registered trademark of mattel inc velcro is a registered trademark of velcro industries b.v copyright 1999 by deborah springer

160 160 if you have purchased a silicone vinyl mix doll such as baby emily or sheila micheal s dolls please see important information at the bottom of the page 160 attention owners of reborn sheila micheal s or other silicone vinyl mix dolls in the world of reborn dolls there is a constant quest to improve and create new methods 160 many of these methods do not stand the test of time 160 at tina s tots we have chosen to take 160 a more conservative wait and see approach in many new reborn techniques 160 because of that we have not added sheila michael s or baby emily to the dolls that we reborn 160 there was evidence several months ago that the silicone vinyl mix was reacting chemically to certain types of substances including a particular type of pacifier 160 now we have learned that the product commonly known as baby fat granules used in dolls such as sheila micheal s and baby emily reborn is causing a chemical reaction that is literally causing the doll to ooze and breakdown 160 if you have such a doll please check with the reborn artist who made it and have the baby fat granules removed 160 it is possible that even the harder poly pellets are melting within these dolls 160 this reaction has so far not been seen in the berenguer 160 we will continue to monitor this situation but at this point the only dolls that seem to be a concern are the silicone or silicone vinyl mix dolls that are mentioned above 160 if you have any questions please feel free to email us at tina mcculloch tina s tots exciting news on our new feature page 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 introducing our very first doll of the spring 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 robin little robin made her entrance into the world on a beautiful early spring day thus her name 160 no long sleeves for this sweet girl she is ready for spring with her short sleeve dress that is pink and precious 160 matching diaper cover of course and ruffled pink and white socks and white shoes complete robin s spring accessories 160 we didn t want the sun to get in robin s eyes so she also has a little pink bonnet that graces her light brown hair 160 robin has beautiful hazel eyes that are accented by both top and bottom brown lashes 160 her lips are the color of a rose in bloom and her cheeks have the blush of a health baby 160 robin weighs about 5 pounds and is 21 inches long 160 she can wear a preemie size outfit and some birth to three month size outfits 160 we are sure this baby will fly right out the door so please email 160 and make robin yours today 160 robin is a cheep $150.00 plus $15.00 shipping and insurance within the lower 48 states 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160 160

week every weekend and ship them the following week i must work a full time job in addition to running packrat toyz hopefully one day i can make packrat toyz my full time job and begin shipping the same day orders are placed but for now please give me a little room contact information telephone 713 884 1112 please leave a message or fax 267 569 0326 location pearland tx electronic mail general information all shipping via international shipping will be more that my shopping cart charges through paypal you must contact me after you place an order to find out the balance due on shipping for international orders if you do not contact me to make arrangements your order will ship ground delivery if the funds paid will cover shipping if not your shipment will be held until shipping payment arrangements are made send mail to packrat toyz with questions or comments about this web site copyright a9 2003 2004 2005 packrat sales company last modified april 25 2005

www.selfstorageservicesinc.com/ business_and_economy having enough room is essential to living a comfortable life whether you are packing up and moving from coast to coast city to city or just need some extra space you have got to have enough room this applies to corporate america as well who may need some additional space to place inventory files or extra equipment to free up additional space for everyday use students who head out of town for the summer can keep their possessions safe until the fall returns members of our military will always find a home for their treasured possessions as they move from state to state or country to country our experienced and courteous storage professionals will be there to help you as needed whether you are loading unloading or unpacking we have all of the moving and packaging supplies you will ever need many of our locations have rental trucks to make getting your things from one place to the next even easier our unbeatable prices we will keep your budget as safe as your belongings once your things have been safely placed away you will find that you have complete peace of mind and of room to move

may want to free closets and rooms of extra clutter so that the place shows better maybe you have too much furniture for your new home the kids have moved out but you can t part with all their childhood memorabilia you want to store items for different seasons you have stacks of documents that you need to keep but don t want them to take up living space within new jersey and the greater philadelphia area lackland self storage provides complete coverage for your self storage needs with self storage mini storage climate controlled storage and home and office storage locations in avenel nj bayville nj belleville nj bloomfield nj brick nj bricktown nj and many other new jersey towns lackland self storage is a one stop shop for all your storage and packaging needs more.. moving and packing tips ok you ve done goodbye to all your soon to be former neighbors secured that new living space for when you get to where you are going and made arrangements with every possible utility and service provider for your old home and new home as well now it s time to pack everything up for the trip to the new place whether you are moving just around the corner or across the globe how you pack the precious items you have spent a lifetime collecting will determine exactly how successful the move really is it is imperative that you exercise extreme caution in planning your packing a little forethought goes a long way where packing is concerned it will pay off in the long run sturdy boxes packing tape bubble wrap and packing peanuts can all be purchased at most local self storage companies these days it is easier and more convenient to simply order these items online wardrobe boxes and other specialty boxes can be found there too while up newspaper old pillows and blankets make for great padding in a pinch it is best that you purchase the materials that are intended for the job more than one person has regretted using grandma s favorite knitted afghan as moving padding for their delicate furniture right after they discover the newly engraved pattern on the outer face of the piece more.. home self storage in new jersey spanish speaking self storage in nj boxes packaging materials links copyright 2003 all rights reserved

expert real estate guidance and hassle free mortgage assistance up to $1 000 or more when you buy or sell a home great mortgage rates quality service and $300 credit click here or call 800 823 0849 to get moving featured certified moving consultant cmc amsa is pleased to recognize fredrick g faerber iii for his 28 years as a certified moving consultant fredrick is a third generation mover who began his moving career in his grandfather s moving company and made his first road trip at the age of 5 in a 1938 dodge van by the age of 18 he acquired is chauffeur s license what today is called a commercial driver s license and has been driving ever since for five years he worked for republic van lines where he was afforded the opportunity to learn other aspect of the moving and storage business such as sales accounting and office operations but to this day prefers hauling shipments seeing the country and meeting people rather than being confined to an office fredrick over the years has been honored with numerous safety and low claims awards click here to find a cmc click here to learn about past featured please note that the provisions and requirements outlined on this website apply only to regulated interstate movers local intrastate and commercial zone movers may have different requirements from those described herein warning unethical movers who are not members of amsa or movers who do not participate in our certified mover program sometimes display our logos on their websites without our permission don t be fooled be sure to call our membership department at 703 683 7410 or email at to verify their participation before deciding to use a mover that displays our logos it is also important to understand that there are many internet sites promoting companies that either arrange moves brokers or provide lists of referral s to movers for a fee the fee is paid to you the mover or sometimes by both you and your mover after you have completed on line inventory of the items you wish to move while some of these companies may require that their advertisers brokers or movers comply with consumer protection regulations of the federal government most do not so be careful don t assume that just because a company is shown on the internet that they are a legitimate and reputable moving company you will need adobe acrobat reader to view some files on this website click on the link below to download your free copy of acrobat reader now this website is best viewed with internet explorer 4.0 or higher american moving and storage association 1611 duke street alexandria va 22314 phone 703 683 7410 fax 703 683 7527 email copyright 2004

party sites will let you leave shurgard s site these linked sites are not under shurgard s control and shurgard is not responsible for the contents of the linked sites privacy policy privacy security and cookies shurgard has created this statement in order to demonstrate our firm commitment to privacy the following discloses our information gathering and dissemination practices for our web site we use a secure server for your online transactions when you place an order or access your order information we offer the use of a secure server the secure server software ssl encrypts all information before it is sent to us furthermore all of the customer information we collect is protected against unauthorized access this site has security measures in place to protect the loss misuse and alteration of the information under our control credit card information is not stored in the member profile or on the web server other personal information is maintained within a secure windows nt server environment no visitor information is sold or traded to other companies your internet protocol ip address and email address are used to help identify you and your shopping cart and to gather broad demographic information we also use your ip address to help diagnose problems with our server and to administer our web site we may also use the information we collect to notify you about important changes to our web site and special offers that might be of interest to you users have the option to not receive future communications please send email to to have your email address removed from our database our site uses forms for customers to request information regarding our products and services including pricing we collect user specific contact information such as their email address and mailing address and financial information such as account or credit card numbers for purposes of ordering and billing for these products and services contact information is used by shurgard to contact the visitor regarding their quote reservation and or purchase we do not sell rent or trade this customer specific information to any third parties we may provide aggregate statistics about the use of our web site and customer sales traffic patterns and other e commerce related information to reputable third party vendors but these statistics will have no information which personally identifies our customers or visitors this site may contain links to other unrelated sites shurgard is not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of such web sites cookies a cookie is a small bit of text used by a browser to store information when you visit a site that uses cookies the web server will request permission to pass a cookie to your browser if accepted it will occupy only a few bytes on your hard drive and can improve your web surfing experience shurgard uses cookies to track customer visits through our site this information enables us to save you time when returning to the site by saving your access information so you don t have to re enter it each time you visit cookies also provide a smoother shopping experience by helping us to uniquely identify shopping carts cookies cannot profile your system or collect information from your hard drive and although you may receive cookies from many different sites each cookie can only be read by the web server that originally issued it at we do not use cookies to store credit card numbers or any other personal identification you aren t even identified by name or e mail address just by a unique string of numbers that we assign the first time you come to our site your consent by using our online locator reservation and ordering services you consent to the collection of this information within the parameters allowed by our privacy policy shurgard will post any changes to our policy on this page of our web site contact shurgard if you have any questions about our privacy policy or your visit to this web site please contact webmaster shurgard storage centers inc zip city state shurgard worldwide select denmark belgium france the netherlands sweden united kingdom

www.mobillaunch.com/ recreation/sports home model c model u purchasing info contact shopping cart check out welcome new lower prices mobil launch 99 is a vehicle mounted support for clay target throwers adapted for use with a 2 receiver tube trailer hitch mobil launch 99 was designed to address the major problem associated with target throwers absorbing the recoil action by providing a stable portable support system proper location and orientation for mounting the target thrower that doesn t result in strain on the users back muscles usually associated with normal cocking process it provides a comfortable seating area while operating the target thrower within the rear of the vehicle it provides upper target and lower ground adjustments no more bending no more sore back no more attaching your trap to a spare tire sit and throw with comfort from the back of your vehicle with all your accessories within arms length mobil launch 99 enables a mechanical trap thrower to perform at its designed capacity with maximum yards every throw solid support field setup in seconds strong portable and compact providing 8 upper target and 24 lower ground adjustments accepts major brand of throwers the competitor model from do all traps outer s jr will not adapt to this product heavyweight easy to use built tough to last the test of time secure your mechanical trap with mobil launch 99 mobil launch 99 can also be used for a rifle or pistol rest by simply removing the target thrower and using the bags provided hint fill bags with rice or dry beans to eliminate dust click below to model c model u purchasing info

self made millionaires by brian tracy listen to the audio refdesk the single best source for facts on the net description of our service our sweet natured and well groomed ponies will bring smiles to the faces of the children at your party pony rides at your event will provide the children with memories of happiness and enjoyment laughter and fun we keep our prices affordable so that everyone can enjoy pony rides at their party we have medium and large ponies that can accommodate riders who weigh up to 85 100 pounds appropriate ages are 1 10 years young children may need an adult or parent to walk alongside them each pony can give about 30 rides per hour each ride is 1 2 minutes in length depending on the number of children at the event in planning your event the best idea is to have the pony rides begin 30 minutes to 1 hour after start of the event to insure that everyone has arrived to take advantage of the pony rides we are insured but our safe and gentle ponies are led by competent attentive and concerned leaders in case of inclement weather we can provide large umbrellas to keep the children dry if the weather is too severe you can postpone the event if another date is available holding rain dates would deny others the use of our service we are flexible and can adapt to any situation pony rides can be done in a backyard long driveway sidewalk cul de sac dead end street field park schoolyard etc we can suggest the best place for the most enjoyable pony rides for the children we are sure you will appreciate our friendly prompt reliable and dependable service
