www.beafish.com/ recreation/sports/aquatic_sports seattle los angeles los angeles workshop yes you really can learn to swim in just 3 days our students come to los angeles from all over the country to solve the mysteries of swimming and to conquer their fear of the unknown for 28 years the center s learn to swim workshops have been gently soothing the nervous hearts of thousands of apprehensive adults as the center 92s teachers gently guide them towards unprecedented levels of swimming students are typically college educated professional people between the ages of 30 and 60 with approximately 60 being women and 40 men typically our students are people who have suffered a lifetime of anxiety and embarrassment whenever recreating with friends or family at the beach pool or lake however after completing the passive swimming workshop they are now able to participate in an amazing variety of water activities and aquatic sports that our students never dreamed possible but even more importantly these same students are able to safely share the joy of swimming with family and friends whether in the backyard pool or while on an exotic vacation to a sunny tropical island in the south i 92m paul lennon thanks for visiting my web site many years ago in the 1960 92s i was considered by many to be a gifted competitive swimmer however during those same years i suffered from what is called disorder 94 which unfortunately caused my 12 year career as a competitive swimmer to be somewhat unfulfilled but out of this unique life failure came an unexpected gift i became interested in helping people who suffered water related anxiety it was the perfect marriage of my talent as a swimmer combined with my profound understanding and empathy for people who suffered from anxiety consequently i developed a comprehensive learn to swim series of workshops to help eliminate the frustration and failure that adults too often experience when attempting to master the art and science of staff and i have dedicated our selves to creating the finest adult swimming program in the country and the dozens of media stories about the success of my students i believe says it am a regular guest on radio and television and my adult swim center has been featured in many publications such as shape magazine forbes magazine the los angeles times the washington post the seattle times and self magazine to mention but a few my workshops have also been featured on television 92s good morning america the discovery channel and on abc nbc and cbs evening news these are but only a few of the many dozens of inspirational stories produced by the media about the success of my students because of the enormous amount of news coverage about my program one of the most common questions that people ask is 93how did we do it 94 professionals in the swimming industry often have a difficult time understanding how we can transform non swimmers into relaxed deep water swimmers in a single 3 day workshop after all it takes the average swim school a year or longer for their students to gain the same degree of competency in the water that our students have however until these people experience our philosophy and methodology themselves it will continue to remain a mystery their reaction of amazement and disbelief at our student s success is not surprising because after completing our program the majority of our students not only learn to swim but can swim a mile and tread water for an hour without becoming winded or tired using only the very simplest of skills our students exhibit such a profound level of relaxation and efficiency in the water that athletic ability becomes totally unnecessary this immediately eliminates the hundreds of pool hours normally needed to build stamina strength and coordination that are required in conventional learn to swim programs for a student to become a safe and competent deepwater swimmer our swimmers are calm and quite in the water and after completing a one mile swim or a one hour tread they have pulse rates of only 60 to 80 beats per minute in other words our students are profoundly relaxed comfortable and efficient when swimming and treading for prolonged periods of time over deep water from the start workshop students will experience our powerful yet gentle methodology including exposure therapy and desensitization which is integrated into all of our learn to swim programs students have little if any awareness of this amazing system that surrounds them while in the pool environment this creates a non invasive caring atmosphere of comfort and safety which significantly flattens the student 92s learning curve eliminating the dreaded brain pain our students are then introduced to the simple science of a human body immersed in the weightless environment of water through simple explanations of the physics of swimming smart analogies and eloquent demonstrations the world of water becomes crystal clear and is no longer misunderstood by the novice student the new student must now apply these remarkable yet simple concepts to the real world of water and swimming and what really amazes professionals in the business and new students the most is that just a few hours earlier these same students not only didn t know how to swim but they were also afraid of the water i designed these learn to swim workshops to be an effective alternative to conventional swimming programs by clearly meeting the special needs of the student when conventional teaching techniques have failed 85 again and again i believe even children and adults who aren 92t afraid of the water should take this powerful yet gentle program however we have always dedicated ourselves only to adults who are having difficulties learning to swim it has taken years of research and development that continues to this day to make my passive swimming program truly the simplest gentlest and purist form of swimming there is anywhere it is the heart and soul of what swimming is all about passive swimming is what is absent in conventional learn to swim programs and it is the foundation of everything that is passive swimming program will gently alleviate your feelings of fear and failure by building extraordinary self confidence and truly fine swimming skills in just a few hours of highly specialized instruction you will be transformed into a competent deep water swimmer through a process of gradual desensitization warm water therapy patented teaching aids and comprehensive yet simple teaching methods problems with breath control buoyancy physical tiredness and mental anxiety will be eliminated you will be at peace with the water for the very first time in your life and more importantly you will be deep water safe and totally self sufficient while swimming marie playing with dolphin after completing approximately 15 hours of my passive swimming program you may join me in a tropical paradise where you can participate in one of my ocean adjustment programs you will swim with dolphins in the ocean hand feed friendly fish while snorkeling and take underwater photos of some of the most beautiful coral gardens in the world we have been providing our students with vacation workshops since 1979 during many of our vacation workshops our students have experienced scuba diving water skiing boogie boarding snorkeling river rafting surfing as well as many other water related also conduct workshops in seattle hawaii mexico bora bora south pacific grand cayman island caribbean and a new program in costa rica the jewel of central america we are building a swimming pool in costa rica that is designed specifically to meet the special needs of my program it will be located on one of costa rica s most spectacular beaches with two beautiful homes which are presently under construction all six bedrooms will each have their own private baths from 1981 through 1989 i conducted many 2 day workshops in cities all across america well i will once again be offering 3 day intensive workshops in seattle phoenix new york chicago houston and many other cities as i continue to negotiate with the management of many different aquatic facilities that meet our very special swimming pool requirements i look forward to talking with you and especially working with you in the pool i know you 92ll find my passive swimming program to be a rewarding and thoroughly enjoyable experience thank you again for visiting my web site top

www.australianswimschool.com/ recreation/sports/aquatic_sports australian swim school ceo welcome new to our program adaptive aquatics program for children with special needs started as a pilot program this past june we are now offering this program 2 days a week to all children with special needs the program will focus on water safety and will teach basic swimming skills please click on the characters above for more information buena park clients click the koala swim meet clients click below the australian swim schools opened in november 1977 our business began with a vision that focused on saving infants from drowning in backyard pools the infant program was designed around having a baby capable of rolling over on their back and floating with their hands on their head this style of teaching was accomplished by private lessons and launched our business to become leaders in infant swimming along with teaching infants how to swim we also taught private lessons to all ages our school age children became sound swimmers and we soon developed a us age group swim team called the swim school koalas 94 from our experiences in the pool we developed sound fundamental teaching methods and our business continued to grow our program advanced with time and we now teach mainly group lessons focusing not only on swimming but we also involve child development the australian swim schools are educational aquatic facilities we teach the lifesaving skill of swimming along with contributing to the whole development of a child we believe to swim well is an asset for life the national swim school association asca and the wabc are professional swimming organizations that we belong to and are affiliated with we enjoy speaking nationally as well as internationally on various learn to swim topics and frequently interact with fellow swim schools world wide to continue raising the bar of excellence within the learn to swim community the australian swim schools are able to offer our employees and students a fantastic learning experience the warm clean indoor pools allow a progressive weekly lesson to be taught year round we know this is essential for any retention or progression to occur particularly for children under the age of five today the australian swim schools 92 are growing to multiple locations our areas of targeted growth will be continued expansion inside bally total fitness health clubs along with building stand alone aquatic centers we will be opening year round swim schools in temecula and san diego in 2004 and are continually searching for communities looking for a year round swim school we are committed to consistently enhancing our programs to provide both children and adults the foundation to swim well for life christi ceo australian swim schools like to help with tsunami relief please click below

www.swimdata.com/ recreation/sports/aquatic_sports home web entry is now possible for any team upload your meet defines especially easy if you use or hy tek s meet manager then start accumulating error free entries your meet director can monitor the entries close the meet whenever appropriate then download an entries file that can be directly imported into your meet manager try out the test meet either as entrant or meet director to see how easy the whole process is all monies involved are handled by the web s favorite paypal once entries close and all transactions are cleared you will receive a detailed financial report if your organization does not have meet management software let swim data collect all of your entries via the web then provide you with customized software for your meet ready to run your meet with all entries entered for as little as a quarter per swimmer check out services now comes in 3 flavors lite timed final only full many teams don t need a full featured meet manager lite can handle up to 255 swimmers or relays in a single division timed finals meet the only other limitation compared to is that it does not handle entry or swimmer fees registration is only $50 by far the best value in swimming software will keep track of every time you ever swam those of you that deal with files especially coaches just cannot function as well without pro it allows you to slice and dice any file by lsc team or swimmer you can create new files with subsets of the original data and you can print out results it s free download it now standards pro is another free utility for creating and managing time standards it defines a storage format which makes it easy for your coaches to define a set of standards for their league or organization a number of the programs discussed above have tours allowing you to sample their look feel and function without having to download the program package they can only show a small fraction of what s available but there is still a lot to check out comments questions or suggestions swim data nbsp nbsp nbsp nbs p nb sp nb sp

the story comments or suggestions more glass off reports longboard surfboards surf shop surf gear coupons click here please pass this site to your friends bing man everything about classic bing surfboards i buy california surfboards email for cash old glass off reports i ve taken to riding a longboard nearly exclusively these days a personal evolution that on the surface might be interpreted as retro given that i had been a ground zero participant if a very minor one in the revolution in thought and design that resulted in the abandonment of the longboard for the shorter lighter highly maneuverable equipment that today dominates the lineup worldwide looking back the total rejection of the longboard was a mistake if an understandable one truth is 90 percent of all surfing is done in the less than ideal conditions of size speed and power the best suit most surfing the revolution in its wild eyed enthusiasm failed to take this in to account if it seems that smaller boards work best in bigger surf consider the basic hydrodynamics of a planing surfboard in bigger faster surf less lift is required to achieve maximum speed from allan c in search of captain zero a surfers journey for custom x bodyboards and now corolla surf shop mike has proven to be a strong and took 1st place in esa contest 1 in open bodyboarding he has traveled to costa rica and has been known to sleep in his car just so he can be the first one in the water when the waves are pumping mike will also be putting in some time as an employee of css and we look forward to a good year with this young ripper what to ride what type of equipment should i bring to corolla in order to go surfing i get this question all the time from customers e mailing me from late may all the way through mid august i would recommend a board with some volume to it whether you are body boarding or surfing floatation is the key for you bigger surfers including myself that means a long board just a reminder corolla surf shop rents everything from surfboards high performance body boards skim boards and wetsuits including boots and gloves surf lessons if you are new to the sport of surfing and want to learn how to surf i highly recommend taking a lesson from corolla surf school this is our 9th year of teaching surfing in corolla all of our instructors are experienced outer banks surfers that are cpr trained to learn more about our surf school just click lessons i love surfing and living in corolla i know how lucky i am all of us at corolla surf shop love sharing the stoke welcome to corolla welcome to corolla www.balsaboards.com/ recreation/sports/aquatic_sports a few years ago board meeting surfboards was born almost by accident it all started when xavier lanier a long time surfer and carpenter wanted to build a board out of redwood having never built a wooden board before he wanted to practice on balsa since then he has combined more than 30 years of surfing and carpentry experience to build these beautiful durable and functional surfboards the name reflects our clients and our own attitudes towards surfing it is a serious activity that requires the same kind of attention as your can never miss a board meeting and as any surfer knows you can never miss a good day in the waves your surfboard is the most important tool you have to enjoy your day at the beach with one of our balsa boards you will get the performance you need and turn heads at the same time whatever your balsa board needs are we can meet them length shape and width are only the beginning our boards are can be fit for you so you don t have to settle for a board that rides too high or low custom artwork can also be incorporated in your board while we build every board to be fully functional some customers just enjoy the shear beauty of board meeting surfboards board meeting surfboards in the news how a san francisco surfer became chairman of the board

www.turbotunnel.com/ recreation/sports/aquatic_sports saturday april 30 2005 0 window.location.href categoryid .value shop by products 0 items in products search home products about us how it works surf pics turbo tunnel fin comments news dealers links lexan inside the high end plastic developed by a general electric co scientist daniel fox in 1953 has been used in the space helmets worn on the moon by astronauts buzz aldrin and neil armstrong in stock car windshields and helmets worn by nascar drivers in apple computer inc s colorful imacs pyrex utensils and countless other products tom clancy even refers to an armored vehicle s lexan windows in his 1996 thriller executive orders still unlike teflon the intel microchip and other recognized brands lexan a polycarbonate plastic or resin is no household name not even with professional surfer lance ho whose success partly depends on it his surfboard s patented turbo tunnel fin can add a little whip on your turning and helps to stable out the board in the water he says the 8.5 turbo tunnel fin is now here available in black blue red clear and yellow suitable as a single fin or can be used in a tri fin set up with our 6cm turbo thruster side fin sets you will receive a complimentary turbo tunnel t shirt a complimentary adjust a bolt with each turbo tunnel fin order on the internet tell all your surf buddies enter your email address to receive special offers news and more we gladly accept featured 9.5 turbo tunnel fin due to its unique design the turbo tunnel tm not only provides forward direction and horizontal control it provides all more.. featured 7.5 turbo tunnel fin due to its unique design the turbo tunnel tm not only provides forward direction and horizontal control it provides all more.. home feedback surf pics become a dealer contact us affiliate login refer this site tell a friend or business associate a9 2004 all rights

sale product category list surf report april 28 2005 looks like we went back to winter this morning as a nice low is slipping through giving us plenty of rain and gusty there is some new sw swell underneath the lump and bump so hopefully it will clean up in the next day or two so we can enjoy it the forecast is actually pretty good as we are expecting things to clear up friday and stay really nice for at least the next few days a series of pulses from the sw will give us waves up into the head high plus range from friday through early next week with saturday looking like it will probably be the biggest day persistent nw wind and steep ground swell should keep things and provide surf for those spots that don t do as well with the sw so while we have kind of an ugly day today expect for things to really start looking up as we move into the weekend and next week the water is starting to warm up and we are loaded with new jackets from your o neill quiksilver roxy as well as tons of trunks sandals tees shorts bikinis and everything else you need for the beach stop by the shop to check it out don t forget to check out the forecast more men s trunks men s trunks men s trunks billabong parkinson $52.00 mada sickle $48.00 quiksilver rapture $46.00 men s tees wetsuit jackets lady s sandals reef all star tee $18.00 o neill women s crew $69.95 reef sting raye sandal $22.00 in stock superstore surf forecasts check out the latest in technology from o neill billabong quiksilver hurley and xcel killer dana stocks all sizes for men women and kids we also have full range of wetsuit accessories like booties lycra no one has as many boardshorts as killer dana at last count there were over 300 styles and that is growing everyday all your favorite brands for men women and kids use our new navigation to find the perfect pair we all need to know what is going to happen with the surf and has all the world wide weather info that you will need to figure out how to plan your www.pacificrimsurf.com/ recreation/sports/aquatic_sports founded in san diego california in 2003 i started pacific rim with the philosophy that surfing is not just a sport but rather an entire lifestyle that encompasses athletics adventure meteorology navigation zen hydrodynamics and good old fashioned fun it is with this in mind that i create my surfboards and clothing at pacific rim i have combined modern surfboard design and manufacture with the age old art of shaping by hand with years of global surfing experience and input from some of the best shapers around i have created some spectacular designs that will test your limits no matter what your ability and am always willing to work with you on custom orders no matter how strange so from hardcore to pacific rim is also dedicated to the preservation of our ocean environment in which we spend so much of our time to this end pacific rim is a proud supporter of the surfrider foundation and heal the bay 2005 c pacific rim surf designs all rights reserved

www.surfstix.i12.com/ recreation/sports/aquatic_sports this page uses frames but your browser doesn t support them totally hand made custom surfboards after much thought and consideration i have no desire to enter the rat race making board after board at ridiculously low prices so that i can sell them to shops i would rather remain a sole trader manufacturing only a few very special boards every year i have no desire to enter into mass production but rather to make real custom surfboards that are created individually as a work of very useable art apart from that when the surf is up i like to down tools and go so if you want a board in a hurry this is definitely not the place to go from time to time newly completed non commissioned and used boards will be advertised on the site so please check the link all prices are in a3 uk sterling and do not include packing and delivery if required a cost insurance and freight price can be arranged happy surfing stay cool

www.wardcoffeyshapes.com recreation/sports/aquatic_sports 402 ingalls street suite 13b santa cruz ca 95060 wcs home showroom about wcs order info contact wcs ward s word spring 2003 the single most important feature of any surfboard is the bottom curve from nose to tail no other feature has as dramatic an effect on a board s speed how it paddles and catches waves and how responsive it feels on a wave most surfers fit into one of two categories in their surfing approach one being a down the line speed oriented style the other is a more vertical snappy in the pocket style the type of wave you surf the most will influence your approach but generally a surfer s approach is similar in all types of surf with that in mind each approach requires a different bottom rocker down the line boards are generally flatter from nose to tail vertical in the pocket boards have more overall curve when ordering a board it is important to assess your approach and the waves you surf to dial in a curve that fits your individual style the best way to do this is to work with a shaper who keeps detailed measurements of bottom rocker and can make accurate changes to those dimensions to suite your style and keep you progressing in the direction you want to go wcs home showroom about wcs order info contact wcs all contents of this site 169 2001 ward coffey shapes
www.pointblanks.com recreation/sports/aquatic_sports welcome to point blanks 153 surfboards today surfers can do things no one even dreamed of 30 years ago part of the reason is advances in surfboard design boards are lighter go faster are more maneuverable but one element of total quality is still missing durability we 146 ve all heard stories of pros going to indonesia with a quiver of 10 boards and coming back with three or four of longboard contests at or makaha where 15 boards are broken we have a friend in puerto escondido who has broken 147 boards in six years it 146 s become normal and acceptable to break a surfboard point blanks is working to change that at point blanks we 146 re not satisfied with disposable surfboards made from the same old materials that have been used since the 145 60s instead we tested a wide variety of foams stringer materials cloths and resins to figure out how to build a better surfboard the result is a careful combination of extruded polystyrene foam epoxy resin and direct size warp and twist fiberglass cloths 150 the lightest strongest boards available combine that with our finely tuned designs pioneered by a varied group of shapers and test riders and you end up with some of the best epoxy surfboards available lightweight fast maneuverable strong and durable 150 complete quality fletcher photo amy 2003 point blanks inc by using this site you are representing that you have read understand and agree to be bound by all of the terms and conditions set forth in the terms of use agreement

bisect photos bisect photos albums 3 pictures 21 middot views middot votes 2335 middot comments 0 top rated photos 2.51 5 162 votes 2.6 5 161 votes 2.5 5 135 votes 2.6 5 133 votes 2.57 5 130 votes go to gallery welcome to the pope bisect website the home of the the concept of a was conceived in 1964 by karl pope almost 40 years ago karl saw that there was a need for a surfboard that could break down to a compact size for ease of travel and then could be quickly assembled for surfing from the beginning the goal was one piece performance with two piece convenience karl s first design was the three piece which evolved over time into the present day two piece bisect system thanks to advances in aerospace technology construction methods and materials todays is not only practical but surfs like a one piece surfboard the surfer pictured is karl at diner about 1966 bisect news info check out our used offered on ebay robbo hudson in the u.k call thane pope at 760 268 1066 for our other april specials scroll down to the bottom of the page for photos of our newest models posted by on tuesday 11 january 2005 18 27 04 est 200 reads read more.. bisect news info score 5 bisect news info some great deals on used on ebay fran loving life in costa rica call thane pope at 760 268 1066 for our spring specials posted by on monday 13 december 2004 13 39 17 est 336 reads read more.. 92 bytes 16 thick our new stealth nine footer has a double concave bottom fading into a single concave nose hard down rails aft finishing with a 4 square tail take a look in our pope bisect photos section now april 2004 17 05 11 est 1634 reads read more.. bisect news info score 2.69 bisect news info karl pope and his carbon fiber surfing machine karl pope the man who built the first surfboard that could be taken apart for easier travel and storage has outdone himself his latest invention not only but is also the strongest lightest surfboard of its size ever made drawing on his experience as an aerospace engineer he worked on rocket controls at northrop aircraft in the 1960s pope built the board from carbon fiber the high strength to weight ratio composite favored by airplane designers posted by casey www.thirdworldproductions.org/ recreation/travel third world productions surfing costa rica with local knowledge surfing in costa rica can be a lot more fun when you let third world productions help plan your surf vacation we are now offering the first all girl s surf camp in costa rica in addition to our coed surf camps more and more girls and women are learning to surf these days and many enjoy the experience of learning from and hanging out with other female surfers and there is no better place to learn than costa rica you will find plenty of waves here that are suitable for beginners and don t worry you will still have time to hang out with the guys if you like del mar all girls surf camp has just added a special camp session which will offer you the option of staying and surfing in two separate areas of costa rica spend part of your time surfing in the playa hermosa playa jaco area and the second part of your trip in mal pais all of the camps that we represent are suitable for beginners to advanced surfers why not learn spanish in costa rica we work with a unique language school that offers spanish art or digital photography combined with surfing college credit is available for spanish we can also arrange guided surf trips and personal surf packages including a surf instructor your trip will be much more enjoyable if you have a bit of local knowledge concerning the various surf breaks even if you just need some information we re here to help most surfers who come to our programs become friends for life the philosophy of third world is not corporate in a conventional sense we are a company of surfers who love to share surfing in costa rica with everyone regardless of their budget we try to include our clients in local happenings and events if they like or if you want to be alone and do your own thing that s alright too let us help you plan your next surf vacation and show you some incredible waves in warm tropical waters beautiful scenery fantastic surf friendly people and a surfing lifestyle that can t be matched make costa rica the perfect surf vacation costa rica also has a lot to see in addition to the great surfing be sure and save some time to take in some of the natural beauty of the country costa rica has many national parks to take advantage of while you are here guides are available to point out the wildlife and plants that you might otherwise miss on your own arenal volcano is another one of many popular destinations spend your days soaking in the hotsprings while viewing the beautiful scenery we can also arrange fun activities in our area playa hermosa playa jaco for any members of your group who are not surfing if you are interested we can send you a list of some of the activities available for cheap flights packages are eaten at the local restaurants in and around this way you get to sample all of the different types of food italian german american french swiss tico etc 85 that the area has to offer plus lessons per day one in the a.m and one in the p.m we video tape your costa rica adventure as well as take still photos not only to help in your surfing approach but for the great memories we have an all female class available with lisa quan from surf diva we offer a full body massage in our available packages to work out the kinks we have a referral program and repeat customer program that can out more.. current water quality la county ocean monitoring program tuesday april 12 2005 this is strange weather indeed we have had the winter on record but the water was not as cold as other dry winters you d think that lots of winter storms might hand us some low aquatic temperatures it did not happen but now finally spring is here and the water is now freezing the last wind storm stirred up the bottom shelf of deeper water up to the top and that water be real cold that was pirate lingo it be cold mates the coldest water temp is now and it is spring but the sun is out remember the sun as the late john lennon said strange days peculiar momma all this to say that our group classes promised for april are startin in may may 7th 8th will be the first weekend for both santa monica and el segundo jetty i kinda want to give the weather pattern a chance to settle down and figure itself out so a month later may help it out posted by mary at 07 20 pm pst the surf report is powered by for www.custom-x.com/ recreation/sports/aquatic_sports top what s going on to check out custom x s new line unit x click here there are many new things happening at custom x for 2005 below is a outline of the exciting new products and materials we have in store for you boards first on our board list is the all new v foil the v foil uses two components to help with your rail to rail transition and that is a v tail and v bottom working together these two features help make your flow the v foil has the new white lightning deck which is a filmed tight celled deck material to give the polypro core more flex it comes with nose bulbs for grip and a strong graphite stringer we also are introducing an advanced line of boards called the titan and the titan wing tail these boards are made of polyethylene and have a graphite stringer bottom and channels they are priced right to help enter the world of bodyboarding material custom x is now using filmed polypro backed tight cell deck material we use our tcd material and put a thin film so that it can stick to polypro cores this allows a more flexible board yet has the strength that you are accustomed to with polypro this material is now on our c4 dub booth odb and the vice all other polypro boards are with our signature material fmp fmp is one of the strongest decking material on the market riders we are happy to begin our new year with the same pro team of 2004 david hubbard brandon foster quinones baez sacha are just a few check out our team page to view the whole custom x family of team riders shapers factory our factory is in southern california is about 3 miles from the beach our crew are long time dedicated shapers who can work with the toughest of materials and designs factory demo click here quicktime required customer service we pride ourselves on having the best customer service around our friendly staff will always be there to meet your needs shipping we offer reliable and speedy shipping

var n nav where is the name of your default left nav page which resides in the same directory as the frames page var t where is the name of your default top nav page which resides in the same directory as the frames page var p window.location.search looks for the variable passed from the no frame page on the querystring var i p.indexof if p.indexof 0 p unescape p.indexof 1 p.length if p p h if no variable has been passed in the querystring then set main page to be the home page bf nav p calls frameset building script return false init we have updated and moved our website to please click on the above to go to our homepage or click the direct link below to the page you are looking for profile formed 40 years ago we employ 100 people in the design manufacture installation and maintenance of products for gymnastics sports halls physical education changing rooms and sports hall floors from we have successfully designed manufactured and installed a large number of sports halls and in the uk and overseas and have developed a wealth of knowledge and expertise in the subject if you wish us to help with the design of your sports hall or gymnasium we are confident that our drawing office technicians can offer the most efficient and cost effective layout we can also advise on and provide a suitable range of best value products in gymnastics our reputation is second to none from the start of formal gymnastics in the uk to the present day we have been at the forefront of gymnastics development in the uk we are the only british manufacturer to have a complete range of equipment floors and mats approved by the governing body of gymnastics the fig and have provided equipment for world championships in gymnastics and sports acrobatics plus countless other events including european and national championships we have a wealth of knowledge in the design and installation of specialist gymnastic centres having supplied the majority of such centres in the uk including the national gymnastic centres at and inverclyde as the country s leading sports hall and gymnasium maintenance provider continental has contract with many local authorities sports and leisure centres gymnastic clubs and other organisations throughout the uk our experienced and certified maintenance and installation technicians provide nationwide service support they are backed up by large stocks of spare parts for both our own and other suppliers products and the bespoke fabrication capabilities of our uk manufacturing facility we also offer the same level of support for individual maintenance orders in recognition of the role played by continental in the development of gymnastics in the uk british gymnastics has awarded us the status of official competition apparatus supplier as a result all major british gymnastic events throughout the uk will exclusively use continental equipment floors and mats gymnasts who train on continental equipment will therefore gain a vital competitive edge we are an iso 9001 2000 accredited company and we successfully retain our number one position in the industry by offering benchmark quality products and services at very
